name: osu!scratch
description:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

osu!scratch is a fangame of osu!, made in scratch.

osu!scratch is the first, public beta build, but please note, v0.1.0 only

contains the main menu and the quit button.

If you press any other button (like Play) it will just hide everything 

expect the background.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

MINIMUM

CPU: 3.50 GHz

GPU: Intel Mobile(R) 4 Series Chipset Family

RAM: 2 GB

Storage: 99,627 KB

RECOMMENED

CPU: 7.50 GHz

GPU: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT

RAM: 8 GB

Storage: 1.5 GB
